title: Apple TV: the verdict on everything from The Morning Show to See
text:
At a time when there is already so much “must-see” television available, how could you possibly want more? That is the problem facing Apple, the tech giant which is now entering the streaming game with Apple TV+.

Clearly, the company has to offer something that its competitors, primarily Netflix and Amazon Prime Video (but soon to include rival services from Disney and HBO), do not. And boy have they tried. The new content is bubbling with ideas, some of which land and some of which don’t, but at the very least, Apple’s programming echoes their old ad slogan: Think Different.

Dickinson, a series biopic of the great American poet Emily Dickinson, delivered in effervescent half-hour gobbets, is...
description: At a time when there is already so much “must-see” television available, how could you possibly want more?
